jobs.description: Full marketplace scan — BizBuySell, Flippa, Acquire.com
jobs.prompt: Run a full scan of BizBuySell, Flippa, and Acquire.com. Filter for healthcare and medical businesses priced $50K–$500K with positive cash flow. Score each listing using the scoring matrix and send top deals (3+ stars) to Telegram.

jobs.description: Incremental check for new listings every 2 hours
jobs.prompt: Check for new listings posted since the last scan on BizBuySell, Flippa, and Acquire.com. Only report new listings not previously seen. Score and send any 3+ star deals to Telegram.
Research and write today's DealFlow Daily newsletter. Focus on the best business acquisition deals found in the past 24 hours. Include 3–5 curated deals with commentary. Send to the subscriber list.

Research the past week's healthcare compliance updates from CMS, HHS, and state boards. Write the Compliance Pulse newsletter with the most impactful regulatory changes, plain-English summaries, and action items. Send to subscriber list.

Research the latest health technology trends, startup funding, and digital health innovations from the past week. Write the HealthTech Insider deep-dive newsletter with analysis and implications for healthcare business owners. Send to subscriber list.

jobs.description: Check all platforms for new reviews every 30 minutes
jobs.prompt: Scan Google Business, Yelp, Healthgrades, Vitals, Zocdoc, and BBB for new reviews across all monitored client profiles. Classify sentiment, draft responses, and send alerts for any new reviews found.

Compile a daily digest of all reviews detected in the past 24 hours. Include total counts by platform and sentiment, highlight any urgent items, and summarize overall reputation trends. Send digest to Telegram.

jobs.description: Daily regulatory scan — CMS, HHS, Federal Register
jobs.prompt: Scan CMS.gov, HHS.gov, Federal Register, and Florida state boards for any new regulatory updates, Final Rules, Proposed Rules, guidance documents, or enforcement actions affecting healthcare businesses. Classify by urgency and send structured alerts for any findings.

jobs.description: Morning outreach batch — new emails + follow-ups (weekdays)
jobs.prompt: Process today's outreach batch: send new cold emails to the next 30 leads in the pipeline and execute scheduled follow-ups (Day 3, Day 7, Day 14) for active sequences. Personalize each email based on lead research. Send daily stats to Telegram.

Check for new replies to outreach emails. Categorize each reply as positive (interested), neutral (more info needed), or negative (not interested/unsubscribe). Alert immediately on positive replies. Send summary to Telegram.

Check the order queue at ~/jarvis/data/orders/pending/ for new orders. Process each order in priority order: research, outline, write, polish, format to PDF, and save to completed directory. Send completion notifications to Telegram for each deliverable. Target all orders complete by 6 AM.

Process the content queue at ~/jarvis/data/content/queue/. For each assignment: research the topic, perform keyword analysis, write SEO-optimized content, generate meta descriptions, and save to completed directory. Send batch completion report to Telegram.

jobs.description: Quick health check — critical services + hardware thresholds
jobs.prompt: Run quick health check: verify Ollama API responds, OpenClaw gateway is up, Docker containers are running, and hardware metrics (CPU, memory, GPU temp) are within thresholds. Only alert if something is wrong or approaching critical thresholds.

Run full infrastructure scan: all services (Ollama, OpenClaw, Docker, Tailscale, ChromaDB, SearXNG), all hardware metrics (both Mac Studios), network connectivity, and disk usage. Log results and alert on any anomalies.

Compile a comprehensive daily health digest. Include: overall system status, hardware metrics for both Mac Studios, service uptime, incident count, resource trends (memory/disk), and any recommendations. Send formatted digest to Telegram.
